About the Company: JBF Industries Ltd. stands on a gleaming pinnacle of success as an industry leader in the Polyester Industry value chain today. It was established in 1982, and since then has backward integrated into manufacturing Partially Oriented Yarn (POY), Polyester (BOPET) Film and also various types of Bottle grade, Film grade and Textile grade Polyester chips. JBF became a public limited company in the year 1986. The company has attained phenomenal growth since it became a public limited company, which is substantiated by a 250 times increase in its turnover since. Today, JBF is one of the leading Polyester value chain company`s not only in India and abroad.
